name: Bamboo Pole
description: A makeshift weapon fashioned from a bamboo stalk

name: Boomerang
description: Can be thrown to hit all enemies in a group

name: Magic Knife
description: Despite its name, this weapon has no magical properties

name: Wizard's Wand
description: This wand can be USED in battle to cast BLAZE

name: Copper Sword
description: The cheapest blade that would-be adventurers can afford

name: Chain Sickle
description: The chain catches the enemy and the sickle attacks

name: Iron Spear
description: An effective weapon for those who like to keep their distance in battle

name: Hand Axe
description: Though small, this hatchet is no less deadly

name: Iron Claw
description: Sharp metal claws for those who prefer hand-to-hand combat

name: Broad Sword
description: A finely balanced blade for seasoned adventurers

name: Wayfinder
description: One of the 12 Swords of Power. Never misses its target

name: Giant Shears
description: A giant pair of shears that is worn over the arm

name: Sledge Hammer
description: This heavy hammer can crush all who stand in its way

name: Golden Claw
description: A glimmering golden claw surrounded by an air of danger

name: Flame Sword
description: The blade of this sword seems to be made from fire itself
